body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Johnny Harris and I am a customer service representative from Star Motors. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Johnny, my name is Anna Hernandez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Anna. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is seven seven three five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Anna. Can you also provide me with your address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my address is one two three Main Street, Cityville, State.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Anna. I will make sure to update your details in our system.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Great, thank you, Johnny. I appreciate your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Anna. Feel free to reach out if you need any further help. Have a wonderful day!
